body_text:
This is a big one!  This allows Normandy admins to import experiment definitions from Experimenter into Normandy.  The work flow is: that

a Normandy admin goes to Normandy
goes to the Import Experiments page
Normandy reads the list of Pending experiments from Experimenter
Normandy lists all the experiments with all their details
the Normandy admin can click either Accept or Reject
Accept will insert the experiment into Normandy as if the admin had entered it manually into the new Recipe form and send a message back to Experimenter to say it has been accepted
Reject will send a message back to Experimenter saying it was rejected along with a reason and it will not send any information to Normandy

Testing this locally involves also standing up an Experimenter instance, where can be found here:
https://github.com/mozilla/experimenter
It's fully dockerized so it should be fairly straight forward to setup locally, I can provide help with that.
Thanks for taking the time to review this!
body_html:
This is a big one! This allows Normandy admins to import experiment definitions from Experimenter into Normandy. The work flow is: that

  1. a Normandy admin goes to Normandy
  2. goes to the Import Experiments page
  3. Normandy reads the list of Pending experiments from Experimenter
  4. Normandy lists all the experiments with all their details
  5. the Normandy admin can click either Accept or Reject
  6. Accept will insert the experiment into Normandy as if the admin had entered it manually into the new Recipe form and send a message back to Experimenter to say it has been accepted
  7. Reject will send a message back to Experimenter saying it was rejected along with a reason and it will not send any information to Normandy

Testing this locally involves also standing up an Experimenter instance, where can be found here:

https://github.com/mozilla/experimenter

It's fully dockerized so it should be fairly straight forward to setup locally, I can provide help with that.

Thanks for taking the time to review this!
title: Import Experiments from Experimenter into Normandy
body:
This is a big one!  This allows Normandy admins to import experiment definitions from Experimenter into Normandy.  The work flow is: that 

1) a Normandy admin goes to Normandy
2) goes to the Import Experiments page
3) Normandy reads the list of Pending experiments from Experimenter
4) Normandy lists all the experiments with all their details
5) the Normandy admin can click either Accept or Reject
6) Accept will insert the experiment into Normandy as if the admin had entered it manually into the new Recipe form and send a message back to Experimenter to say it has been accepted
7) Reject will send a message back to Experimenter saying it was rejected along with a reason and it will not send any information to Normandy


Testing this locally involves also standing up an Experimenter instance, where can be found here:

https://github.com/mozilla/experimenter

It's fully dockerized so it should be fairly straight forward to setup locally, I can provide help with that.

Thanks for taking the time to review this!

![](https://screenshotscdn.firefoxusercontent.com/images/2e6a3285-ab30-4e17-90dc-e0cfb0ee1738.png)
